1727.verse: ٱلَّذِينَ|Those who|92|119|20$يُوفُونَ|fulfill|82|136|9425$بِعَهْدِ ٱللَّهِ|the Covenant of Allah|164|218|9426$وَلَا|and not|71|124|25$يَنقُضُونَ|they break|102|129|278$ٱلْمِيثَـٰقَ|the contract,|109|109|9427$

1728.verse: وَٱلَّذِينَ|And those who|119|128|42$يَصِلُونَ|join|93|110|4282$مَآ|what|53|70|262$أَمَرَ ٱللَّهُ|Allah has commanded|162|180|283$بِهِۦٓ|[for it]|64|82|204$أَن|to|44|62|655$يُوصَلَ|be joined,|85|94|9428$وَيَخْشَوْنَ|and fear|107|128|9429$رَبَّهُمْ|their Lord|83|125|3649$وَيَخَافُونَ|and are afraid|112|154|9430$سُوٓءَ|(of) the evil|99|141|481$ٱلْحِسَابِ|the account,|106|127|1790$

1729.verse: وَٱلَّذِينَ|And those who|119|130|42$صَبَرُواْ|(are) patient,|110|132|6772$ٱبْتِغَآءَ|seeking|76|98|1817$وَجْهِ|(the) Face|91|113|9254$رَبِّهِمْ|(of) their Lord|113|135|54$وَأَقَامُواْ|and establish|107|118|2490$ٱلصَّلَوٲةَ|the prayer|91|102|38$وَأَنفَقُواْ|and spend|88|109|3999$مِمَّا|from what|87|108|216$رَزَقْنَـٰهُمْ|We have provided them,|182|203|40$سِرًّا|secretly|73|94|2100$وَعَلَانِيَةً|and publicly|98|109|2468$وَيَدْرَءُونَ|and they repel|116|124|9431$بِٱلْحَسَنَةِ|with the good|112|128|6213$ٱلسَّيِّئَةَ|the evil -|81|97|9432$أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|those|82|98|51$لَهُمْ|for them|76|92|98$عُقْبَى|(is) the final attainment|178|186|9433$ٱلدَّارِ|(of) the Home -|125|125|9434$

1730.verse: جَنَّـٰتُ|Gardens|75|87|9435$عَدْنٍ|of Eden,|75|100|7746$يَدْخُلُونَهَا|they will enter them|153|178|9436$وَمَن|and whoever|105|130|1012$صَلَحَ|(were) righteous|130|155|9437$مِنْ|among|63|75|53$ءَابَآئِهِمْ|their fathers|102|116|5799$وَأَزْوَٲجِهِمْ|and their spouses,|142|170|9438$وَذُرِّيَّـٰتِهِمْ‌ۖ|and their offsprings.|153|182|5800$وَٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ|And the Angels|120|148|1834$يَدْخُلُونَ|will enter|94|108|4491$عَلَيْهِم|upon them|90|160|22$مِّن|from|50|190|53$كُلِّ|every|57|197|185$بَابٍ|gate,|58|128|9439$

1731.verse: سَلَـٰمٌ|(Saying), "Peace|131|147|5633$عَلَيْكُم|(be) upon you|114|145|416$بِمَا|for what|76|107|43$صَبَرْتُمْ‌ۚ|you patiently endured.|170|201|9440$فَنِعْمَ|And excellent|109|125|9441$عُقْبَى|(is) the final attainment|178|365|9433$ٱلدَّارِ|(of) the Home."|123|310|9434$

1732.verse: وَٱلَّذِينَ|And those who|119|136|42$يَنقُضُونَ|break|102|136|278$عَهْدَ ٱللَّهِ|the Covenant of Allah|164|198|279$مِنۢ بَعْدِ|after|91|124|280$مِيثَـٰقِهِۦ|contracting it,|115|132|281$وَيَقْطَعُونَ|and sever|113|135|282$مَآ|what|53|96|262$أَمَرَ ٱللَّهُ|Allah has commanded|162|205|283$بِهِۦٓ|for it|52|95|204$أَن|to|44|87|655$يُوصَلَ|be joined|85|107|9428$وَيُفْسِدُونَ|and spread corruption|165|180|285$فِى|in|48|77|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ‌ۙ|the earth.|92|121|100$أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|Those -|82|111|51$لَهُمُ|for them|76|105|1027$ٱللَّعْنَةُ|(is) the curse,|115|130|9442$وَلَهُمْ|and for them|105|208|71$سُوٓءُ|(is) an evil|90|296|7574$ٱلدَّارِ|home.|68|171|9434$

1733.verse: ٱللَّهُ|Allah|53|62|123$يَبْسُطُ|extends|72|90|9443$ٱلرِّزْقَ|the provision|105|123|9444$لِمَن|for whom|81|99|1356$يَشَآءُ|He wills|69|87|867$وَيَقْدِرُ‌ۚ|and restricts.|109|127|9445$وَفَرِحُواْ|And they rejoice|129|138|8077$بِٱلْحَيَوٲةِ|in the life|90|99|7578$ٱلدُّنْيَا|(of) the world|112|130|818$وَمَا|and nothing|98|116|46$ٱلْحَيَوٲةُ|(is) the life|93|111|1847$ٱلدُّنْيَا|of the world|100|118|818$فِى|in (comparison to)|141|150|89$ٱلْأَخِرَةِ|the Hereafter,|114|209|978$إِلَّا|except|65|256|86$مَتَـٰعٌ|an enjoyment.|115|210|2148$

1734.verse: وَيَقُولُ|And say|80|87|5050$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|103|20$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieved,|97|111|59$لَوْلَآ|"Why has not|109|123|1090$أُنزِلَ|been sent down|126|140|44$عَلَيْهِ|upon him|79|93|395$ءَايَةٌ|a Sign|61|68|1093$مِّن|from|50|62|53$رَّبِّهِۦ‌ۗ|his Lord?"|83|108|392$قُلْ|Say,|50|75|765$إِنَّ|"Indeed,|75|100|58$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|78|184$يُضِلُّ|lets go astray|112|137|274$مَن|whom|58|83|76$يَشَآءُ|He wills|69|82|867$وَيَهْدِىٓ|and guides|91|146|276$إِلَيْهِ|to Himself|85|194|296$مَنْ|whoever|76|185|76$أَنَابَ|turns back,|95|150|9446$

1735.verse: ٱلَّذِينَ|Those who|92|98|20$ءَامَنُواْ|believed|82|94|84$وَتَطْمَئِنُّ|and find satisfaction|155|167|9447$قُلُوبُهُم|their hearts|97|109|1096$بِذِكْرِ|in the remembrance|151|163|9448$ٱللَّهِ‌ۗ|(of) Allah.|86|92|2$أَلَا|No doubt,|85|112|105$بِذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ|in the remembrance of Allah|205|258|9449$تَطْمَئِنُّ|find satisfaction|126|179|9450$ٱلْقُلُوبُ|the hearts."|99|126|9451$

1726.verse: Then is he who knows that what has been revealed to you from your Lord is the truth like one who is blind? They will only be reminded who are people of understanding -

1727.verse: Those who fulfill the covenant of Allah and do not break the contract,

1728.verse: And those who join that which Allah has ordered to be joined and fear their Lord and are afraid of the evil of [their] account,

1729.verse: And those who are patient, seeking the countenance of their Lord, and establish prayer and spend from what We have provided for them secretly and publicly and prevent evil with good - those will have the good consequence of [this] home -

1730.verse: Gardens of perpetual residence; they will enter them with whoever were righteous among their fathers, their spouses and their descendants. And the angels will enter upon them from every gate, [saying],

1731.verse: "Peace be upon you for what you patiently endured. And excellent is the final home."

1732.verse: But those who break the covenant of Allah after contracting it and sever that which Allah has ordered to be joined and spread corruption on earth - for them is the curse, and they will have the worst home.

1733.verse: Allah extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it]. And they rejoice in the worldly life, while the worldly life is not, compared to the Hereafter, except [brief] enjoyment.

1734.verse: And those who disbelieved say, "Why has a sign not been sent down to him from his Lord?" Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, Allah leaves astray whom He wills and guides to Himself whoever turns back [to Him] -

1735.verse: Those who have believed and whose hearts are assured by the remembrance of Allah. Unquestionably, by the remembrance of Allah hearts are assured."
